interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: L’ANGE HAIR Wide Tooth Comb Tortoiseshell Acetate | Lightweight, Smooth, Compact Design | Easy Glide Wide Tooth Comb
Review Date: 2022/08/21
Store: L'ANGE HAIR
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '0.25 x 7 x 3.13 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2427', 'UPC': '810108190974'}
Review Text: This comb is ok. It is really pretty and I like the leather-style envelope. It makes it nice to pack for traveling. The comb itself feels a little breakable, but we'll see. It is not for intense tangles. I found that it works best for light tangles or just combing out already styled hair. I used my Wet Brush on my wet hair and then smoothed it out further with this comb. It is pretty though and looks luxurious on my bathroom counter.
Review Title: Works ok
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
C.O. Bigelow No. 007 Dr Hiosous Quince Hand Lotion, 4 Ounces
C. O. Bigelow
{'Brand': 'C. O. Bigelow', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '4 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Hands', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.6 x 2 x 0.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '20002240'}
This is a nice hand cream. The tube is a generous size. I've used C.O. Bigelow products in the past and have always enjoyed them so I was interested in trying this hand cream. It's very moisturizing! I usually use it after washing my hands or if I wake up in the night with dry hands from air conditioning. It's not so thick that it's hard to get out of the tube, and it's not very greasy, but still feels really good and moisturizing, taking a minute to really absorb. The smell is great! I wasn't really familiar with the scent of quince before. All I knew about it was that it was a fruit. The smell is really nice, I don't even know how to describe it! Subtly fruity, maybe a little spicy too, definitely enjoyable! This is a great product and will last a long time.
Lovely!
EltaMD Skin Recovery Essence Hydrating Toner for Face, Face Toner for Oily Skin and Sensitive Skin, Alcohol Free Formula, Helps Detoxify and Hydrate Skin, pH Balanced, Oil Free, 7.3 oz Bottle
{'Brand': 'EltaMD', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'EltaMD Skin Recovery Toner helps to repair damaged skin, calms skin and helps to minimize the risk of irritation.EltaMD Skin Recovery Toner helps to repair damaged skin, calms skin and helps to minimize the risk of irritation.  See more', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Professional Skin Care', 'Product Dimensions': '1.19 x 1.19 x 6.31 inches; 7.3 Ounces', 'Item model number': '090205077518', 'UPC': '090205077518', 'Manufacturer': 'EltaMD', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'}
This is a nice toner. It gently tones the skin after cleansing. It leaves my skin feeling soft and moisturized, not tight or dry. I'm looking forward to using it more along with other products from Elta MD. It feels gentle on my skin, which is especially nice as it gets drier during the winter months. The bottle is a nice large size as well, so it is a good value.
Soothes my skin
Sand & Sky Face Roller & Massager Tool. Aussie Skincare Essentials Firming Face Roller, Sculpt, Sooth & Contour to Banish Puffiness and Boost Serum Absorption.
Sand & Sky
{'Package Dimensions': '8.19 x 6.46 x 2.95 inches; 9.35 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Sand & Sky'}
This is a fun tool! I already use jade rollers and gua sha and all that good stuff so I was excited to try this facial roller. I use it after applying serum to really help it absorb. It feels amazing! The metal feels cold on my face and it's just fun to use. It helps wake me up in the morning and feels great, like I'm doing something luxurious. It's easy to glide across the face and you can just rinse it off when you are done. A nice tool and I enjoy using it.
Soothing
100% PURE Cocoa Coffee Body Scrub Exfoliating Deep Cleanse with Sea Salts & Nourishing Oils Natural Moisturizing Skincare Radiant Skin Restore & Pore Cleanser for Women & Men Vegan - 10oz
100% PURE
['Our invigorating cacao and coffee body scrub buffs away bumps and flakes for radiant, deeply nourished skin. We source the highest quality organic and fair trade Ecuadorian cacao, which contains beneficial tannins, flavonoids, and antioxidants. Natural caffeine from coffee and cacao offers calming benefits to reduce redness, combat the effects of UV damage in skin, and promote a glowing complexion.']
{'Brand': '100% PURE', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Nourished', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic, Gluten Free, Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.74 x 3.58 x 1.93 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1BCCBS', 'Department': 'mens', 'UPC': '843585108033', 'Manufacturer': '100% PURE'}
This is a good scrub. It smells amazing and very chocolate-y! The scrub itself is a good texture. I wish it was a tad less runny but it isn't a big deal. The crushed coffee beans and sea salt give good scrub and the glycerin adds moisture. I will say that it does make a big mess. My shower looked so gross afterward. Thankfully I have a detachable shower head so I was able to easily spray around and clean things up because it was all over the place! Oh well. My skin felt soft and smooth and I'm obsessed with the scent so I'll continue to use it.
Smells delicious!
Kristin Ess The Oversized Satin Scrunchie ? Cheetah
Kristin Ess
['But make it fashun! This chic satin, oversized scrunchie can be wrapped once or twice depending on the thickness of your hair. Try securing your ponytail with a regular elastic first and then put this over to maximize the look!']
{'Material': 'Satin', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Kristin Ess', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '10.55 x 6.26 x 1.46 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'Item model number': '184-KES-0309', 'UPC': '840797141438'}
This oversize scrunchie is so cute and fun! The look is super trendy and feminine. It's such an easy way to dress up what would otherwise be a basic bun or ponytail. The rust color is great, especially for Fall and Winter. Overall it feels fun and a little bit fancy.
So cute
L’ANGE HAIR Wide Tooth Comb Tortoiseshell Acetate | Lightweight, Smooth, Compact Design | Easy Glide Wide Tooth Comb
L'ANGE HAIR
{'Product Dimensions': '0.25 x 7 x 3.13 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2427', 'UPC': '810108190974'}
This comb is ok. It is really pretty and I like the leather-style envelope. It makes it nice to pack for traveling. The comb itself feels a little breakable, but we'll see. It is not for intense tangles. I found that it works best for light tangles or just combing out already styled hair. I used my Wet Brush on my wet hair and then smoothed it out further with this comb. It is pretty though and looks luxurious on my bathroom counter.
Works ok
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Strong inclination towards moisturizing hand lotions, hydrating facial products, and innovative skincare tools that enhance routine effectiveness and comfort. Recently expanded interest to body scrubs that offer exfoliation and nourishment. Also appreciates hair accessories that add style and convenience to hair routines, now including lightweight, stylish combs suited for travel.

- **Brand Loyalty:** Established preference for C.O. Bigelow and positive experiences with EltaMD while remaining open to exploring brands like 100% PURE, particularly those offering organic and vegan options. Shows interest in fashionable yet practical hair accessories from reputable brands.

- **Texture Preference:** Prefers lotions, toners, and scrubs that are light, non-greasy, and absorb well, providing smooth application without residue. Enjoys scrub textures combining exfoliation with moisturizing benefits and favors materials like satin for hair products.

- **Usage Habits:** Regularly incorporates hand creams, facial toners, skincare tools, and trendy hair accessories into daily routines. Recently introduced body scrubs for a deeper cleanse and has added a stylish comb for light styling and smoothing.

- **Fragrance Appreciation:** Enjoys subtly fruity and unique scents, with a fondness for chocolate and coffee scents.

- **Skincare Routine Enhancement:** Continues to enhance routines with tools like facial rollers and effective exfoliants, as well as accessories that improve skin health and contribute to an overall soothing experience.

- **Overall Sentiment:** Evaluates products highly, valuing quality and effectiveness, while balancing enjoyment with practicality, particularly mindful of sensitive or dry skin.
